pkgmetadata.longdescription: gsm0338=======.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/dsch/gsm0338.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/dsch/gsm0338Python Codec for 3GPP TS 23.038 / ETSI GSM 03.38Examples--------Decode GSM 03.38 encoded bytes: >>> import gsm0338 >>> b'\x1b(\x1b)'.decode('gsm03.38') u'{}'Encode bytes in GSM 03.38: >>> import gsm0338 >>> u'{}'.encode('gsm03.38') b'\x1b(\x1b)'How it works------------The codec implements the encoding and decoding methods in the stateless codecs.Codec class.With loading the module the codec get's automatically registered.Mapping source--------------`3GPP TS 23.038 version 13.0.0 Release 13`_.. _3GPP TS 23.038 version 13.0.0 Release 13: http://www.etsi.org/deliver/etsi_ts/123000_123099/123038/13.00.00_60/ts_123038v130000p.pdf3GPP TS 23.038 Rel-13: Alphabets and language-specific informationhttp://www.3gpp.org/dynareport/23038.htm
